AssociatedOrderItemInventory.description: Controls whether the inventory of the associated order item is included in the inventory of the main order item.

AssociatedOrderItemSumPricing.description: An enum that describes how the related order item summary is priced relative to the primary order item summary.

AssociatedOrderItemSummaryId.description: The related order item summary of this order item summary relationship. For bundle relationships, this denotes the ID of the child order item summary.

AssociatedOrderItemSummaryRole.description: The role of the associated order item summary of this relationship.

AssociatedQuanScaleMethod.description: An enum that describes how to scale the quantity of the associated order item summary relative to the main order item summary.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency of the OrderSummary.

MainOrderItemSummaryId.description: The primary order item summary ID of this order item summary relationship.

MainOrderItemSummaryRole.description: The role of the primary order item summary of this relationship.

MainOrderSummaryId.description: The ID of the main order item summary.

OrderItemRelationshipId.description: The order summary ID of the order item summary.

ProductRelatedComponentId.description: The lookup ID from the product related component.

ProductRelationshipTypeId.description: The lookup from the product relationship type.
